channel.title: Sprites help!
channel.description:
I have 2 problems I need fixed right away.
1. When I click on the attack symbol in the top-left where you view your weapon things, you have to click in the bottom-right of the image for it to show your combat stuff. This also happens when I click on certain sprites, I have to click on the right side of them to be able to view the interface.
2. When I go to the prayer section, the prayer icon in the little black box has grey around it, just like in the skills section. How do I fix this?

item.title: Sprites help!
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I have 2 problems I need fixed right away.

  1. When I click on the attack symbol in the top-left where you view your weapon things, you have to click in the bottom-right of the image for it to show your combat stuff. This also happens when I click on certain sprites, I have to click on the right side of them to be able to view the interface.

  2. When I go to the prayer section, the prayer icon in the little black box has grey around it, just like in the skills section. How do I fix this?
